title: Samples, ca. 1915
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: plain compound satin
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 18.5 x 9.5 cm (7 5/16 x 3 3/4 in.)
description: Reproduction textile samples adopted from a Lucchese design in the collection of the Cooper Union Museum. Samples (b/g) of black, blue, green, purple, and taupe with gold weft with a pattern of serpentine branches with ogive blossoms and Chinese-inspired monsters between serpentines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Samples, ca. 1915. Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: plain compound satin. 1915-5-4-b/g.
